body:
Which version of Radiance are you using. Try [this link](https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases/download/5.0/radiance-5.0.0-win64.exe) for installer: [https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases/tag/5.0](https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases/tag/5.0)

and make sure you're changing the installation address to "c:\radinace"
